Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, Gui
public interface View

  • Method Details

    • askPosition

      int askPosition​(java.util.List<int[]> positions) throws TimeOutException
      This method asks a box from a given list. It is called for choosing workers starting position, worker for the current turn, destination of a move, a build or a remove
      Parameters:
      positions - List of possible boxes
      Returns:
      Chosen box
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • askCards

      int askCards​(java.util.List<GodCardProxy> cards) throws TimeOutException
      This method asks to user to chose a card to use in this match
      Parameters:
      cards - List of all cards chosen by the challenger
      Returns:
      Chosen card
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • askDeck

      int[] askDeck​(java.util.List<GodCardProxy> cards) throws TimeOutException
      This method asks cards of the match to challenger
      Parameters:
      cards - List of all cards of the game
      Returns:
      Chosen cards indexes
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • askConfirmation

      int askConfirmation​(CommunicationProtocol key) throws TimeOutException
      This method asks confirmation to player
      Parameters:
      key - Key that tells which is the request for the player
      Returns:
      Answer by the player
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • askIp

      java.lang.String askIp()
      This method asks ip to user
      Returns:
      Ip address

    • askMatchType

      int askMatchType()
      This method asks match type to user
      Returns:
      Match type returns 1 for 2 players returns 2 for 3 players

    • askPort

      int askPort()
      This method asks port to user
      Returns:
      Port number

    • askUserName

      java.lang.String askUserName​(CommunicationProtocol key) throws java.io.IOException
      This method asks username to user
      Parameters:
      key - Key that could be USERNAME or UNIQUE_USERNAME
      Returns:
      Username
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Needed for cli view

    • askWorker

      int askWorker​(java.util.List<int[]> workers) throws TimeOutException
      This method asks worker to move in current turn
      Parameters:
      workers - List of movable workers
      Returns:
      Chosen worker position
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

    • prepareAdditionalCommunication

      void prepareAdditionalCommunication​(CommunicationProtocol key)
      This method allows views to show different messages base on the key
      Parameters:
      key - Key that identifies different messages

    • updateMap

      void updateMap​(java.util.List<BoxProxy> boxes)
      This method updates the map with new positions and buildings
      Parameters:
      boxes - List of all boxes of the map

    • setMyPlayer

      void setMyPlayer​(PlayerProxy player)
      This method sets player's infos
      Parameters:
      player - Player infos

    • setOpponentsInfo

      void setOpponentsInfo​(java.util.List<PlayerProxy> players)
      This method sets opponents infos
      Parameters:
      players - Opponents infos

    • connectionFailed

      void connectionFailed​(java.lang.String host)
      This method shows error of connection refused
      Parameters:
      host - Host that refused the connection

    • setCurrentPlayer

      void setCurrentPlayer​(PlayerProxy player)
      This method sets current player
      Parameters:
      player - Current player

    • tellStory

      void tellStory​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> events)
      This method tells what last player did in the last turn
      Parameters:
      events - List of action made in the last turn

    • setWinner

      void setWinner​(PlayerProxy player)
      This method tells who is the winner of the match
      Parameters:
      player - Winner

    • setLoser

      void setLoser​(PlayerProxy player)
      This method tells if an opponent has lost the match
      Parameters:
      player - Loser

    • connectionLost

      void connectionLost()
      This method shows error message of connection lost

    • timeOut

      void timeOut()
      This method tells if player's time to do his action runs out
